feed.title: ZFW – Advances in Economic Geography
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in ZFW – Advances in Economic Geography

entry.title: The complementarity and connectivity of locations: digitalization, sustainability, and disruptions
entry.summary: Article by Pengfei Li, Ram Mudambi DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/zfw-2025-0057

entry.title: Uneven development instead of complementarity: how the repatriation of FDI-profits fuels capital accumulation in Germany
entry.summary: Article by Christof Parnreiter, Klara Kolhoff, Laszlo Steinwärder, Christian Obersteller DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/zfw-2024-0065

entry.title: How aerospace clusters respond to the challenge of sustainability: a comparison of the Toulouse and Montreal clusters
entry.summary: Article by Hassan Pishdadian, Alain Aubertin, Ekaterina Turkina, Patrick Cohendet, Laurent Simon DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/zfw-2024-0062

entry.title: New economic geographies of war: risks and disruptions in Eurasian transport routes and supply chains through the military conflict in Ukraine
entry.summary: Article by Franziska Sielker, Peter Dannenberg DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/zfw-2024-0059

entry.title: Communities in the internationalization process
